subject: Re: [junit] Re: Any plans to revamp junit?
msgSnippet: ... Excellent point. What he has heard is wrong. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603 Let s write
messageBody:
Ilja Preuss wrote:

> J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
> > The statement "all serious people have their own test
> > runner" is just downright absurd.
>
> I agree, but to be nitpicking it wasn't stated that way by the OP. He
> wrote he *heard* that this was the case. Perhaps you just should have
> answered: "What you've heard is wrong." ;)

Excellent point.

What he has heard is wrong.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
